text: Ara smarana karo! Tadera bala hayechila -- ''e janabasatite basabasa karo, ara e theke ahara karo yakhana-yekhane iccha karo, ara balo'hittatuna’, ara sadara-daraja diye prabesa karo natamastake, tomadera samasta bhulabhranti amara tomadera theke ksama kare debo. Uparantu amara bariye debo subhakarmidera jan'ya.’’
